title: OXO Microfiber Extendable Duster
description: OXO's Extendable Duster with a pivoting microfiber head puts dust within reach. The sturdy, lightweight aluminum body extends to 54" long with a quick twist to easily dust those hard-to-reach places. The Duster head rotates 270 degrees and locks at multiple angles, depending on your cleaning needs. Lock the Duster head in a vertical position to clean ceiling vents and light fixtures or at a right angle to remove dust from the tops of bookshelves and cabinets. When you're done with one side, simply rotate the head to use the clean side of the duster head for extended cleaning.

asset.author: OXO
asset.hookText:
http://www.oxo.com/p-1213-microfiber-extendable-duster.aspx 

OXO's Extendable Duster with a pivoting microfiber head puts dust within reach. The sturdy, lightweight aluminum body extends to 54" long with a quick twist to easily dust those hard-to-reach places. The Duster head rotates 270 degrees and locks at multiple angles, depending on your cleaning needs. Lock the Duster head in a vertical position to clean ceiling vents and light fixtures or at a right angle to remove dust from the tops of bookshelves and cabinets. When you're done with one side, simply rotate the head to use the clean side of the duster head for extended cleaning.

transcripts: At OXO the average height is 5'7 inches so sometimes we need a little extra help when cleaning. OXO extendable duster with pivoting microfiber head puts dust within reach. This sturdy light weight aluminum body extends up to 54 inches long with a quick twist to easily dust those hard to reach places. The duster head rotates 270 degrees and locks at multiple angles depending on  your cleaning needs. Lock the duster head in a vertical position to clean ceiling vents or light fixtures or at a right angle to remove dust from the top of bookshelves and cabinets. When you're done with one side simply press the button and rotate the head to use the clean side of the duster head for extended cleaning. To clean the microfiber head simply unsnap it from the duster. For best results machine wash in cold water without fabric softener or bleach and dry without using heat. Here's a good tip the duster also locks at perfect angles for dusting window blinds and ceiling fans.
